mdRecord.dcterms:description: This small part of a sheet of paper appears to be a mimeograph. A large portion of the text in the middle has been crossed out. Only the beginning ("The petition of the teachers asking the public to indorse them for the coming year is quite a surprise.") and ending ("they have enjoyed the utmost confidence of the people. Not an issue has been raised against them, so why should they have reasins to murmur.") remain.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Teachers Petition for Endorsement
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African Americans -- Education
